title: Dionysii Halicarnasei Quae Exstant, Volumen Quintum
Opsuculorum, Volumen Prius
monogr.author: Dionysius of Halicarnassus

p.quote:
touti\ ga\r
a(pa/ntwn tw=n kakw=n e)/sxaton
p.#text:
pollh\n xa/rin h)=n ei)de/nai tw=| kaq' h(ma=s xro/nw| di/kaion, 
w)= kra/tiste *)ammai=e, kai\ a)/llwn me/n tinwn e)pithdeuma/twn
e(/neka nu=n ka/llion a)skoume/nwn h)\ pro/teron,
ou)x h(/kista de\ th=s peri\ tou\s politikou\s lo/gous
e)pimelei/as ou) mikra\n e)pi/dosin pepoihme/nhs e)pi\ ta\
krei/ttw. e)n ga\r dh\ toi=s pro\ h(mw=n xro/nois h( me\n 
a)rxai/a kai\ filo/sofos r(htorikh\ prophlakizome/nh kai\
deina\s u(/breis u(pome/nousa katelu/eto, a)rcame/nh me\n
a)po\ th=s *)aleca/ndrou tou= *makedo/nos teleuth=s e)kpnei=n
kai\ marai/nesqai kat' o)li/gon, e)pi\ de\ th=s kaq' h(ma=s
h(liki/as mikrou= deh/sasa  ei)s te/los h)fani/sqai: e(te/ra 
de/ tis e)pi\ th\n e)kei/nhs parelqou=sa ta/cin, a)fo/rhtos
a)naidei/a| qeatrikh=| kai\ a)na/gwgos kai\ ou)/te filosofi/as
ou)/te a)/llou paideu/matos ou)deno\s meteilhfui=a e)leuqeri/ou,
laqou=sa kai\ parakrousame/nh th\n tw=n o)/xlwn

a)/gnoian, ou) mo/non e)n eu)pori/a| kai\ trufh=| kai\ morfh=|
plei/oni th=s e(te/ras dih=gen, a)lla\ kai\ ta\s tima\s kai\ ta\s
prostasi/as tw=n po/lewn, a(\s e)/dei th\n filo/sofon e)/xein,
ei)s e(auth\n a)nhrth/sato kai\ h)=n fortikh/ tis pa/nu kai\
o)xlhra\ kai\ teleutw=sa paraplhsi/an e)poi/hse gene/sqai
th\n *(ella/da tai=s tw=n a)sw/twn kai\ kakodaimo/nwn
oi)ki/ais. w(/sper ga\r e)n e)kei/nais h( me\n e)leuqe/ra kai\
sw/frwn gameth\ ka/qhtai mhdeno\s ou)=sa tw=n au(th=s kuri/a,
e(tai/ra de/ tis a)/frwn e)p' o)le/qrw| tou= bi/ou parou=sa
pa/shs a)cioi= th=s ou)si/as a)/rxein, skubali/zousa kai\ dedittome/nh
th\n e(te/ran: to\n au)to\n tro/pon e)n pa/sh| po/lei
kai\ ou)demia=s h(=tton e)n tai=s eu)paideu/tois  h( me\n *)attikh\ mou=sa kai\
a)rxai/a kai\ au)to/xqwn  a)/timon ei)lh/fei sxh=ma, tw=n 
e(auth=s e)kpesou=sa a)gaqw=n, h( de\ e)/k tinwn bara/qrwn
th=s *)asi/as e)xqe\s kai\ prw/|hn a)fikome/nh, *mush\ h)\ *frugi/a
tis h)\ *kariko/n ti kako/n,  *(ellhni/das h)ci/ou
dioikei=n po/leis a)pela/sasa tw=n koinw=n th\n e(te/ran, h(
a)maqh\s th\n filo/sofon kai\ h( mainome/nh th\n sw/frona.

quote:
kai/toi me/ros
ge tou= panto\s h(/misu a)rxh\ le/getai/ te kai\ e)/stin
p.#text:
a)lla\ ga\r ou) mo/non  kata\ *pi/ndaron, a)lla\ kai\ texnw=n nh\ *di/a kai\
e)pithdeuma/twn ge kai\ panto\s a)/llou spoudai/ou xrh/matos.
e)/deice de\ o( kaq' h(ma=s xro/nos, ei)/te qew=n tinos
a)/rcantos ei)/te fusikh=s perio/dou th\n a)rxai/an ta/cin
a)nakuklou/shs ei)/te a)nqrwpi/nhs o(rmh=s e)pi\ ta\ o(/moia

pollou\s a)gou/shs, kai\ a)pe/dwke th=| me\n a)rxai/a| kai\ sw/froni
r(htorikh=| th\n dikai/an timh/n, h(\n kai\ pro/teron
ei)=xe kalw=s, a)polabei=n, th=| de\ ne/a| kai\ a)noh/tw| pau/sasqai
do/can ou) prosh/kousan karpoume/nh| kai\ e)n
a)llotri/ois a)gaqoi=s trufw/sh|. kai\ ou) kaq' e(\n i)/sws 
tou=to mo/non e)painei=n to\n paro/nta xro/non kai\ tou\s
sumfilosofou=ntas a)nqrw/pous a)/cion, o(/ti  ta\ krei/ttw
timiw/tera poiei=n tw=n xeiro/nwn h)/rcanto , a)ll'
o(/ti kai\ taxei=an th\n metabolh\n kai\ mega/lhn th\n e)pi/dosin 
au)tw=n pareskeu/ase gene/sqai. e)/cw ga\r o)li/gwn
tinw=n *)asianw=n po/lewn, ai(=s di' a)maqi/an bradei=a/ e)stin
h( tw=n kalw=n ma/qhsis, ai( loipai\ pe/pauntai tou\s fortikou\s
kai\ yuxrou\s kai\ a)naisqh/tous a)gapw=sai lo/gous,
tw=n me\n pro/teron me/ga e)p' au)toi=s fronou/ntwn ai)doume/nwn 
h)/dh kai\ kata\ mikro\n a)pautomolou/ntwn pro\s
tou\s e(te/rous, ei) mh/ tines panta/pasin a)nia/tws e)/xousi,
tw=n de\ newsti\ tou= maqh/matos a(ptome/nwn ei)s katafro/nhsin
a)go/ntwn tou\s lo/gous kai\ ge/lwta poioume/nwn
th\n e)p' au)toi=s spoudh/n.

ai)ti/a d' oi)=mai kai\ a)rxh\ th=s tosau/ths metabolh=s 
e)ge/neto h( pa/ntwn kratou=sa *(rw/mh pro\s e(auth\n a)nagka/zousa
ta\s o(/las po/leis a)poble/pein kai\ tau/ths de\
au)th=s oi( dunasteu/ontes kat' a)reth\n kai\ a)po\ tou= krati/stou
ta\ koina\ dioikou=ntes, eu)pai/deutoi pa/nu kai\ 
gennai=oi  ta\s kri/seis geno/menoi, u(f' w(=n kosmou/menon
to/ te fro/nimon th=s po/lews me/ros e)/ti ma=llon e)pide/dwken

kai\ to\ a)no/hton h)na/gkastai nou=n e)/xein. toiga/rtoi
pollai\ me\n i(stori/ai spoudh=s a)/ciai gra/fontai toi=s
nu=n, polloi\ de\ lo/goi politikoi\ xari/entes e)kfe/rontai
filo/sofoi/ te sunta/ceis ou) ma\ *di/a eu)katafro/nhtoi
a)/llai te pollai\ kai\ kalai\ pragmatei=ai kai\ *(rwmai/ois
kai\ *(/ellhsin eu)= ma/la diespoudasme/nai proelhlu/qasi/
te kai\ proeleu/sontai kata\ to\ ei)ko/s. kai\ ou)k a)\n qauma/saimi
thlikau/ths metabolh=s e)n tou/tw| tw=| braxei=
xro/nw| gegenhme/nhs, ei) mhke/ti xwrh/sei proswte/rw mia=s
genea=s o( zh=los e)kei=nos tw=n a)noh/twn lo/gwn: to\ ga\r
e)k panto\s ei)s e)la/xiston sunaxqe\n r(a/|dion e)c o)li/gou mhde\ ei)=nai.

a)lla\ ga\r to\ me\n eu)xaristei=n tw=| metaba/llonti ta\
pra/gmata xro/nw| kai\ to\ tou\s ta\ kra/tista proairoume/nous
e)painei=n kai\ to\ ta\ me/llonta e)k tw=n gegono/twn
ei)ka/zein kai\ pa/nta ta\ paraplh/sia tou/tois, a(\ ka)\n
o( tuxw\n ei)pei=n du/naito, a)fh/sw, e)c w(=n d' a)\n e)/ti mei/zw 
la/boi ta\ krei/ttona i)sxu/n, tau=ta peira/somai le/gein,
u(po/qesin tou= lo/gou koinh\n kai\ fila/nqrwpon kai\
plei=sta duname/nhn w)felh=sai labw/n. e)/sti de\ h(/de,
ti/nes ei)si\n a)ciologw/tatoi tw=n a)rxai/wn r(hto/rwn te kai\
suggrafe/wn kai\ ti/nes au)tw=n e)ge/nonto proaire/seis tou=
te bi/ou kai\ tw=n lo/gwn kai\ ti/ par' e(ka/stou dei= lamba/nein
h)\ fula/ttesqai, kala\ qewrh/mata kai\ a)nagkai=a
toi=s a)skou=si th\n politikh\n filosofi/an kai\ ou) dh/pou

ma\ *di/a koina\ ou)de\ kathmaceume/na toi=s pro/teron. e)gw\
gou=n ou)demia=| toiau/th| perituxw\n oi)=da grafh=|, pollh\n
zh/thsin au)tw=n poihsa/menos. ou) me/ntoi diabebaiou=mai
ge w(s dh\ kai\ safw=s ei)dw/s: ta/xa ga\r a)\n ei)=e/n tines
ai( e)me\ dialanqa/nousai toiau=tai grafai/, to\ de\ th=s 
a)pa/ntwn i(stori/as o(/ron e(auto\n poiei=n kai\ peri\ tou= mh\
gegone/nai ti tw=n dunatw=n gene/sqai le/gein au)/qades
pa/nu kai\ ou) po/rrw mani/as. peri\ me\n ou)=n tou/twn
ou)de\n e)/xw, kaqa/per e)/fhn, diabebaiou=sqai. tw=n de\
r(hto/rwn te kai\ suggrafe/wn, u(pe\r w(=n  o( lo/gos, pollw=n 
pa/nu o)/ntwn kai\ a)gaqw=n to\ me\n u(pe\r a(pa/ntwn
gra/fein makrou= lo/gou deo/menon o(rw=n e)a/sw, tou\s de\
xariesta/tous e)c au)tw=n proxeirisa/menos kata\ ta\s h(liki/as
e)rw= peri\ e(ka/stou, nu=n me\n peri\ tw=n r(hto/rwn,
e)a\n de\ e)gxwrh=|, kai\ peri\ tw=n i(storikw=n. e)/sontai de\ 
oi( paralambano/menoi r(h/tores trei=s me\n e)k tw=n presbute/rwn,
*lusi/as *)isokra/ths *)isai=os, trei=s d' e)k tw=n
e)pakmasa/ntwn tou/tois, *dhmosqe/nhs *(uperei/dhs *ai)sxi/nhs,
ou(\s e)gw\ tw=n a)/llwn h(gou=mai krati/stous, kai\
diaireqh/setai me\n ei)s du/o sunta/ceis h( pragmatei/a, 
th\n de\ a)rxh\n a)po\ tau/ths lh/yetai th=s u(pe\r tw=n presbute/rwn
grafei/shs. proeirhme/nwn dh\ tou/twn e)pana/gein
kairo\s e)pi\ ta\ prokei/mena.
